entries.title: Tesla just had its best week since May 2013
entries.description: Tesla shares rose 33% to close their best week since May 2013, boosted by positive economic data and an earnings beat.

entries.title: House Speaker McCarthy spoke with Musk about making Twitter 'fair on all sides'
entries.description: McCarthy also confirmed to reporters on Friday he had convened a meeting in his office that day with Elon Musk and several top Republicans.

entries.title: Why desalination won't save states dependent on Colorado River water
entries.description: Desalination plants can be costly and energy-intensive, and are difficult to manage in an environmentally friendly way, according to water policy experts.

entries.title: Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon gets 29% pay cut to $25 million after tough year
entries.description: While the bank was hit by industrywide slowdowns in capital markets activity, CEO David Solomon also faced his own set of issues last year.

entries.title: Intel stock tumbles after brutal results
entries.description: Intel shares fell Friday, after the company reported horrid quarterly and full-year results, off slackening chip demand.

entries.title: Key Fed inflation measure eased in December while consumer spending also declined
entries.description: The personal consumption price index excluding food and energy for December increased 4.4% from a year ago.

entries.title: The DOJ's antitrust case against Google is ambitious but risky
entries.description: If the government gets its way, it could result in the breakup of Google's digital advertising business and expand the boundaries of antitrust law.

entries.title: The outgoing CEO of a giant autos firm had a message for his successor: Don't be like me
entries.description: After Akio Toyoda, CEO and president of Toyota, announced he was stepping down on Thursday, he shared his advice to his successor and his business philosophy.

entries.title: $6.6 billion-worth fintech Wise accused by rival of harming competition
entries.description: Wise was accused of harming competition in the money transfer market by delisting a rival, Atlantic Money, from its currency exchange comparison tool.

entries.title: Big Oil poised to smash annual profit records — sparking outcry from campaigners and activists
entries.description: Energy giants are expected to use their windfall profits to reward shareholders with higher dividends and share buybacks.

entries.title: British finance minister sticks to tax-hiking plans, pledges post-Brexit reforms
For Ukraine, Western tanks could be a game changer in the conflict
entries.description: Leopard 2s have a big advantage for Ukraine: They're widely available in Europe.

entries.title: Adani shares plunge further as it weighs legal action against short seller firm
entries.description: Adani Group companies' stock prices dropped for a second consecutive trading session after Hindenburg announced its short position in the conglomerate's firms.

entries.title: Beyoncé, a $100k-a-night suite and a red carpet of influencers: Dubai basks in its booming economy
entries.description: Beyoncé was performing her first live concert in more than four years at a private event for the opening of Atlantis The Royal, a $1.4 billion luxury hotel.

entries.title: China looks past Covid as tourist bookings surge for the Lunar New Year
entries.description: People in China are moving past the pandemic and going out to travel, preliminary data for the Lunar New Year holiday show.

entries.title: India is a true bright spot in the midst of a global downturn, top execs and policymakers say
entries.description: Executives and officials say relatively moderate inflation, high infrastructure spending and digital developments are a boon; though many challenges remain.

entries.title: Here's where mainland Chinese traveled overseas for the Lunar New Year
entries.description: Travel booking site Trip.com ranked the top overseas destinations for travelers from mainland China during the first four days of the Lunar New Year holiday.

entries.title: A 26-year-old founded a medical startup — the same year he lost almost half his vision
entries.description: Its devices assess cardiovascular risk through the use of retinal imagery and artificial intelligence — a first of its kind, Mediwhale told CNBC Make It.

entries.title: Intel's horrible quarter revealed an inventory glut and underused factories
entries.description: "Clearly, the financials aren't what we would hoped," Gelsinger told analysts.
